title: Distributed Learning Design Based on Communities of Inquiry to Overcome Educational Limitations of MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of practical experience in the field or foundational theoretical understanding
context.additional_context: Small-scale inquiry group operations and asynchronous discussion systems to promote collaborative learning and self-directed learning among learners

learning_goals: Learners can enhance collaborative competencies by providing and incorporating peer feedback three or more times during the project period
Establishing and implementing self-directed learning plans at least twice weekly in distributed learning environments
Maintaining MOOC participation rates above 80% and establishing social presence through learning community activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
